message.content:
cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.PF, cs.CY

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes a framework for authentication of Distributed Energy Resources to the centralized control system of a DC MicroGrid, which involves control loops of power electronic converters. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper focuses on secure and reliable authentication of Distributed Energy Resources, which is a security concern in MicroGrids. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper proposes the use of IEEE 802.11 wireless interface for networked communication in the MicroGrid. 
- cs.PF (Performance): The paper discusses the performance of the proposed authentication scheme using PLECS-based simulations. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper may also fall under this category as it discusses the social implications of the proposed scheme, such as promoting direct and active participation of the control system in the authentication process.
